passages.text:
Ah, hello again, stranger. You stayed the night in one of Mr. Petterson's trailers, yes? You should know, he may not be the type of person you want to associate with. A man like him makes it difficult for nature to maintain balance.
[[I'm not planning on associating with him.->No associate]]
[[It's none of your business who I talk to.->No business]]

links.name: I'm not planning on associating with him.
It's none of your business who I talk to.

passages.name: Start

passages.text:
That is wise. But on to brighter things: how are you enjoying our land so far?
[[I like it here.->Like it]]
[[It seems like any other town I've passed through.->Any other town]]
[[I'm trying to leave as soon as possible.->Leave]]

links.name: It seems like any other town I've passed through.
I'm trying to leave as soon as possible.

passages.name: No associate

passages.text:
Ah, but of course I do. It is my duty to understand everything that goes on here, and I am afraid that I do not yet understand you. I do hope that I was not wrong to invite you so warmly into my town.
[[Continue]]
passages.name: No business

passages.text:
This is good, as we were in need of more love to balance out the hate that some of our other citizens produce. It seems that the sea brought you to us precisely when we needed you.
[[Continue]]
passages.name: Like it

passages.text:
Yes, I suppose that to a cow, no field is preferable to another, so long as they both have grass. Even so, I trust you will grow founder of it over time.
[[Continue]]
passages.name: Any other town

passages.text:
And yet, here you remain for the time being. So I suggest that you not make things any more difficult for yourself than they need be.
[[Continue]]
passages.name: Leave

passages.text: May the tides flow in your favor, stranger.
passages.name: Continue
